about_the_game:
Relax In Space provides you the ability to explore an alternate reality, some levels are in first person while some other content is in 3rd person. You can visit virtual planets in stunning detail. You can visit stars, moons, planets, black holes, and more. There is also a virtual art gallery with certain objects that are...out of this world. Relax In Space is meant to provide a casual, but interesting viewing experience, it doesn't require any skill to play. Some elements may provide you with a questionable reality.



The game comes with at least 10 levels, each with a highly detailed object in them that you can look at.

Other details
- 4K Graphics
- HD Audio
- Virtual Art Museum
- Replicas of the Sun, Earth, Moon, and Jupiter can be found
- Different star types, blue, red, orange
- Different black holes
- And more

Ambient music will be included but can be turned off if you want to listen to your own music. If you're a musician or artist, we would love to work with you and feature your art or music in the game; contact us if you are interested!

Relax In Space was inspired by films like Interstellar, The Martian, GRAVITY, and more. Relax In Space provides you with the ability to travel and experience new worlds from the comfort of your home.

Some parts of this game include flashing lights! If you have a sensitivity to lights or flashing lights please be aware!

Get up close and personal with ultra high detailed planets like Earth


Future Update Considerations -

- Experimental VR Support
- PS4/Xbox/Steam Controller Support
- Steam Achievements

content_descriptors.notes:
Descriptions of drug use, alcohol, marijuana, and some PG13 adult imagery exist in the main menu and game. 

Psychological elements exist that may make you question reality.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Ubuntu 22
  • Processor: Core i7, at least a quad core
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes.
  • VR Support: Unknown and Untested at this time
  • Additional Notes: Experimental Support
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS, Ubuntu 22
  • Sound Card: yes.
  • VR Support: Unknown and Untested at this time
  • Additional Notes: Experimental Support

name: Relax In Space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 - at least 4GB of VRAM - Try the free demo out.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes.
  • Additional Notes: Try the demo!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7 10700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3080 - 12GB of VRAM preferred
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes.
  • VR Support: Experimental UEVR
  • Additional Notes: Try the demo!

short_description: You are a human sitting behind a digital display. Explore an alternate reality so you can question your own. Visit a virtual museum, black holes, stars, planets, moons, and more. Maybe you can fall into a black hole while you're at it. Not everything is as it seems..
